attributes.action: Make it mandatory for CCTV in all private day nurseries with parents access
attributes.additional_details: Protect children from child abuse and predictor in nursery
attributes.background: Make it mandatory for CCTV for private nurseries for parents to access

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Require CCTV in all early years settings" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750797
